title: Thursday, April 4, 2019
text:
Thursday, April 4, 2019 Investigators have released their findings on the Ethiopian Airlines 737 Max plane crash. They say the crew followed all the manufacturer's instructions. So how much blame does Boeing bear? Did the attorney general fail to portray some of the key findings of the Mueller probe? Newspapers report that some on a special counsel's team think a summary omitted vital information. And ICE officials target a technology company in Texas. 280 suspected undocumented immigrants were arrested during a raid there yesterday. What happens now for them and their families?
